WTSAFPRP.label: Fasting Subsample Weight
WTSAFPRP.target: Both males and females 12 YEARS - 150 YEARS

LBXTR.label: Triglyceride (mg/dL)
LBXTR.target: Both males and females 12 YEARS - 150 YEARS

LBDLDLN.label: LDL-Cholesterol, NIH equation 2 (mg/dL)
LBDLDLN.text: LBDLDLN = (LBXTC/0.948 – LBDHDD/0.971 – (LBXTR/8.56 + (LBXTR * (LBXTC – LBDHDD))/2140 – LBXTR^2/16100) – 9.44), round 0 decimal places) for LBXTR less than 800 mg/dL, and missing for LBXTR GE 800 mg/dL. ^2 stands for power=2, or squared. LBDHDD from public release file P_HDL
LBDLDLN.target: Both males and females 12 YEARS - 150 YEARS
